channel.title: Notes on Sync'ing from Memory
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Sync'ing from Memory

item.title: Quick Notes - Hardware-aware programming on MacOS
item.description: Short notes - pointers to programming for speed and efficiency, leveraging hardware-specific features available on ARM Apple Silicon. MacOS-focused at most places, although ideas are easy to generalise.

item.title: LLMs: Exploring To Understand
item.description: Delving into LLMs to probe how they do what they do.

item.title: LLMs: Understanding Tokens and Embeddings
item.description: An overview of what tokens and embeddings mean in the context of LLMs - and related models. Please use the code along side for more grounding. Code links towards the end.

item.title: MLX
item.description: MLX 20/80. With 20% effort, hope to get 80% covered on MLX’s offerings. And, I don’t stand by this claim.

item.title: Probability
item.description: Probably definitely incomplete notes on probability.

item.title: Notes for Deep Learning with Python
item.description: Chapter-wise notes for Deep Learning with Python with Python and Clojure code samples. The book is not done. These notes are evolving as I get deeper both into the book and the accompanying code.

item.title: JS Quick Restart for the Impatient
item.description: For polyglots who can’t keep too many languages in their heads and need a deep refresher.

item.title: Clojure
item.description: Clojure Notes - An aimless dump of anything and everything interesting I find and manage to record.

item.title: Org-mode Quick Guide
item.description: Summarized guide for features I commonly use, for quick reference.
